long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of entering the same details across multiple job applications? Let JobFillr streamline it for you! This Chrome extension automates the process by instantly populating job application fields with your essential details, saving you time and effort.

üîí Secure and Private
Your privacy matters. JobFillr securely stores your data locally in your browser, ensuring it‚Äôs only used to streamline your job applications.

Don‚Äôt let tedious applications slow you down!
Install JobFillr today and experience a faster, more efficient application process.

Permissions
- JobFillr requires this permission to be able to detect job application forms and auto-fill these forms. The permission will display a warning message: "Read and change all your data on the websites you visit‚Äù.
